The college has directed research guides, Research scholars and the system of assessment of academic and research work leading to award of degrees at Masters and Research level in the form of thesis, dissertation and research publications, books and chapters in books and similar research works which reflected the highest element of academic integrity and originality observed as per provision of the college and University Grants Commission (UGC).
A research committee is formed to monitor and promote the research activities among students and teachers on the campus. It gives advice and assist to the Head of the institution and the College Council in the fulfillment of the research aspects of the College Strategic Plan. The mission of the research committee is to enhance quality research by adhering to the highest ethical standards and professional best practices and to inculcate innovation and performance centered research culture among faculties and students. To minimize the plagiarism in research works, College Central library has started the Plagiarism Checking Service using the software URKUND provided by the University of Calicut.
